title: Danderyds sjukhus metro station
text:
Danderyds sjukhus is a <a href="Stockholm%20metro">metro</a> station in suburban <a href="Danderyd%20Municipality">Danderyd Municipality</a>, north of <a href="Stockholm">Stockholm</a>, <a href="Sweden">Sweden</a>.
The station was opened on 29 January 1978 as part of the extension from <a href="Universitetet%20metro%20station">Universitetet</a> to <a href="M%C3%B6rby%20centrum%20metro%20station">Mörby centrum</a> and serves the nearby <a href="Danderyds%20sjukhus">Danderyds sjukhus</a> hospital. The <a href="M%C3%B6rby%20railway%20station">Mörby railway station</a> on the <a href="Roslagsbanan">Roslagsbanan</a> is situated a few hundred metres from this station.
